claim_evidence: thatit there is ample room for translation quality improvements through better selection of formsclass-based agreement model improves translation qualityminimal increase in decoding time
evidence: However , using lexical coverage experiments , we show thatit there is ample room for translation quality improvements through better selection of forms that already exist in the translation model.they writewilland Our class-based agreement model improves translation quality by promoting local agreement , but with a minimal increase in decoding time and no additional storage requirements for the phrase table .
text: However , using lexical coverage experiments , we show thatit there is ample room for translation quality improvements through better selection of forms that already exist in the translation model.they writewilland Our class-based agreement model improves translation quality by promoting local agreement , but with a minimal increase in decoding time and no additional storage requirements for the phrase table .

evidence: For English-to-Arabic translation , we achieve a +1.04 BLEU average improvement by tiling our model on top of a large LM .146 Proceedings of the 50th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics , pages 146155 , Jeju , Republic of Korea , 8-14 July 2012 .

evidence: One potential avenue of future work would be to adapt our component models to new genres by self-training them on the target side of a large bitext .10 To focus on possibly inflected word forms , we excluded numbers and punctuation from this analysis .11 The annotator was the first author .
text: One potential avenue of future work would be to adapt our component models to new genres by self-training them on the target side of a large bitext .10 To focus on possibly inflected word forms , we excluded numbers and punctuation from this analysis .11 The annotator was the first author .
